sodium_lithium.name: Sodium + Lithium
sodium_lithium.description:
Sodium: Best-in-class FPS Improvements
and
Lithium: Best-in-class TPS Improvements

iris_lithium.name: Iris + Lithium
iris_lithium.description:
Iris: A shaders mod, includes Sodium
and
Lithium: Best-in-class TPS Improvements

labels.pick_optimizer_mod: Please choose an Optimization Mod you prefer from the options below:

status.parsing_files_api: Parsing Files API and Modrinth API...

select_one.title: No Mod Chosen
select_one.message: You must choose an Optimization Mod to use.

unexpected_exit.title: Unexpected Error
unexpected_exit.message: Encountered an unexpected and unhandled error! Program will now exit. No details available.

unexpected_error_template.title: Unexpected Error: $<error-title>
unexpected_error_template.message:
Encountered an unexpected and unhandled error! Program will now exit. More details below:

Trace: $<error-trace>

Message: $<error-message>

Additional Info: $<error-extra>

unsupported_api_format_version.title: Unsupported API Version
unsupported_api_format_version.message: This installation of Aitecraft Profile Manager does not support the specified API format. Please update to a newer version. Program will now exit.

http_error.title: HTTP Error
http_error.message: Error encountered while performing HTTP request. Ensure you have an active internet connection before trying again. Program will now exit.

uptodate.title: Up-To-Date
uptodate.message: No update required! You have the latest version of the modpack installed.

folder_doesnt_exist.title: Folder Not Found
folder_doesnt_exist.message: The folder you were trying to open does not exist. Would you like to create and then open the folder?

create_empty_jar.title: "Create Empty JAR" Changed - Are you sure?
create_empty_jar.message:
An empty JAR is required by the vanilla launcher to properly install Fabric. However, some third-party launchers may not install Fabric properly with an empty JAR present.

If you proceed, you might have to re-install Fabric.

profile_name_is_id.title: "Profile Name is Profile ID" Changed - Are you sure?
profile_name_is_id.message:
Most launchers, except the new C++/CEF based vanilla launcher, run into problems when the Profile Name and Profile ID do not match. Disable this option only if you are using the newest vanilla launcher.

If you proceed, you might have to update the modpack profile, either by simply clicking the Update Profile button, or by re-installing Fabric.

strict_hash_check_changed_warning.title: "Strict Hash Check" Changed - Are you sure?
strict_hash_check_changed_warning.message:
Enabling this will FORCE the "Verify Files" option to re-download ALL files which encounter a hash mismatch - including config files. This means some mod config files will also get reset when running "Verify Files".

Only enable this if you think that your config files are messed up. The mod JAR files are re-downloaded in case of a hash mismatch regardless of this option.

mc_dir_changed_warning.title: Changing Minecraft Directory - Are you sure?
mc_dir_changed_warning.message:
Your current Minecraft directory is set to:

$<mc_dir>

Would you like to change it? (Choose "Yes" only if you know exactly what you're doing, the profile manager will not verify that the selected directory is a Minecraft directory.)

unexpected_error_fallback.title: Unknown Error
unexpected_error_fallback.message: No error string was provided for translation. See trace or additional info for more details.

optimizer_mod_unexpected.title: Optimizer Mod Processing Error
optimizer_mod_unexpected.message: Expected to get a mod ID. Got an empty string instead. Very strange error. Please see other details...

files_api_has_version_num_greater_than_a.title: Files API Error
files_api_has_version_num_greater_than_a.message: The Files API may be misconfigured. This error also occurs if the main API cache is outdated. Try relaunching the Aitecraft Profile Manager...

files_api_no_url_provided.title: Files API Error
files_api_no_url_provided.message: URL field is null, empty or missing in Files API.

mc_no_matching_version_found.title: Minecraft Version Not Found
mc_no_matching_version_found.message: The specified version of Minecraft by the API was not found in the Minecraft versions list.

bulkdownload_arrays_size_mismatch.title: Bulk Download Error
bulkdownload_arrays_size_mismatch.message: File Path and File URLs arrays are of different sizes. Could also be that the arrays are empty.

client_data_tried_deleting_non_existant_.title: Client Data Deletion Error
client_data_tried_deleting_non_existant_.message: A non-existant file record was requested to be deleted from the Client Data files list.

modrinth_api_no_matching_version_found.title: Modrinth API Error
modrinth_api_no_matching_version_found.message: Specified version not found in the Modrinth API for specified mod.

modrinth_api_no_matching_file_found.title: Modrinth API Error
modrinth_api_no_matching_file_found.message: Required file not found in the Modrinth API for specified mod.
